Q: How to make Lemon Swirl Lemon curd fudge at home.

Q: how to make sweet potato spoonbread
O: (A) Bring 2 cups milk, 2 tablespoons each butter and brown sugar, 1 teaspoon kosher salt and a pinch of cayenne to a boil. Reduce the heat to a simmer; whisk in 1/2 cup cornmeal. Beat 3 egg whites to stiff peaks; fold into the batter. Transfer to a buttered 8-inch square baking dish; bake at 375 degrees F until puffed, 30 minutes. Q: How to make Special Dark chocolate Bar Chocolate Ice cream at home.

Serve with dark hot fudge sauce.
